'''Secret Source Dragon Cannons'''<!-- name from Loading Screen --> are an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]]. 

They are the artillery units of [[Secret Source Dragon Idol]]s that have been disassembled. They resemble stone cubes with a large piston protruding from one side. When the piston is pushed in, the Cannon will deactivate, possibly triggering a reward, another mechanism, etc. This can only be done using a [[Tatankasaurus]] or [[Collective of Plenty]] character's skill.

In the wild, Secret Source Dragon Cannons can be found in various states, including active (will track the player and continuously fire projectiles), inactive (will not attack, but piston can be pushed in), and dormant (will not attack, piston retracted).
